Address: 81-85 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Lifestyle Property - the best of the Bellarine
Available for viewing by Appointment call 0409 289 230 to confirm your attendance
Sitting majestically elevated on top of High Ridge, overlooking the surrounding countryside this property is positioned to capture the panoramic views of Corio Bay, Geelong and the You Yangs. Effortlessly combining contemporary style with classic features, this Master Built home boasts spacious, light filled living areas and outstanding design features providing for direct access out to private courtyards and covered entertaining areas.
Vaulted Ceilings in the main living zones create a sense of spaciousness, full length Western Red Cedar windows bring the outside in, slate flooring and a double sided open fire place deliver the living, dining and kitchen zones instant lifestyle appeal. The kitchen features stainless steel bench tops and splashbacks, mountain ash timber carpentry and quality appliances.
A private Home Office adjacent to the front entrance again benefits from spectacular views making work from home a great pleasure. Through to an opulent ensuite complete with sunken spa bath & uninterrupted views, WIR and beyond to the Master Bedroom with private balcony. Additional bedrooms with high ceilings, BIR's and central bathroom all capture views out to the lush, leafy gardens, rolling hills and courtyard spaces.
Downstairs provides another complete package. An informal family living area and excellent guest accommodation, with its large L shaped rumpus room, purpose built wine cellar, separate laundry and bathroom. Full length windows and sliding glass doors give access directly to the landscape gardens of this 2.5 acre property.
This spectacular property pays homage to the fine art of living, the pleasures of entertaining and combines an abundance of additional features: double garaging with direct access, ducted central heating, water storage tanks, shedding, and secure fencing. Enjoy all that the Bellarine has to offer with its award winning vineyards, Olive groves and famous surf beaches.
Insights: 81-85 High Ridge Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Panoramic VIEWS! Immaculate Home
The homes with the best of views tend to be tightly held. Until now. Take advantage of the opportunity to secure a beautiful home only 11 years young, immaculately finished and on a large allotment with incredible, elevated, panoramic Northern views spanning 180 degrees.
Clifton Springs is still very affordable and is the well-kept secret of the Bellarine. The location offers walking distance to the main street of Drysdale and the golf course or a short drive to a number of the Peninsula's best attractions, including award winning wineries, historical sites, great beaches, regular markets, annual events AND neighbours Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington Peninsula.
With an unassuming facade, single level from the street, the home is built over 2 stories and comprises 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 3 toilets, 2 living areas, dining, kitchen, laundry, loads of storage and much more. The main living spaces are North facing with floor to ceiling tinted windows opening out to an entertainers paradise. The large balcony/deck is under cover and takes in exquisite views to the North of Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs. The Kitchen is centrally located, open plan to the meals area and includes a new dishwasher, plenty of bench space, pantry, breakfast bar and 900mm gas/electric stove/oven. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling control the climate all year round. The master bedroom is isolated from the living areas of the home for privacy and includes full ensuite and walk in robe.
Downstairs a large multi-purpose room could be utilized as a teenage retreat, gym, rumpus, 2nd living, guest room, art studio or whatever you desire. Additionally a large wet room has a toilet and vanity and could easily add a shower to make the downstairs suitable for independent living. Loads of storage and an oversized remote lock up 2 car garage / work shop complete the internal attributes of the home.
Outside, low maintenance established native landscapes are accompanied by raised vegetable gardens to keep the green thumb busy and more undercover areas and open spaces give the new owners a choice of places to enjoy the outdoors year round. This is a remarkably built home, well-appointed for the family and must be inspected to be appreciated. Call Dion on 0424 940 629 to arrange an inspection.
Insights: 15 Panoramic Terrace, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Priced to Sell!
New Reduced Price - Vendors keen to sell!
Situated on a spacious 815m2 allotment, this superbly presented home will immediately impress with its well-presented gardens and appealing frontage
Upon entry through the wide entrance hall, you will be greeted with a spacious lounge room complete with gas heater and ceiling fan. Modern open plan kitchen offering dishwasher, electric oven and breakfast bar, which overlooks the dining area with split system reverse cycle air conditioner.
Down the hallway you will find three good sized bedrooms, with the master offering a walk in robe, ceiling fan and ensuite. Large bathroom with shower, bath and vanity, separate toilet and laundry. Outside the home is a private rear patio area perfect for entertaining all year round, single carport and garden shed. There is also plenty of parking spaces available for a boat, trailer or extra cars.
Located close to schooling, waterfront and everything that the town has to offer, this home could be the start of a lifestyle you've always wanted. Inspection is a must!
Sam Edwards : 0498 427 939
Insights: 34 Maraboora Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect location, ideal for family!
Set on a large block & just minutes from the boat-ramp and golf course, this family friendly design offers great space and privacy. The welcoming floor plan offers 4 spacious bedrooms, 2 large living areas, 2 bathrooms and the sought after setting adds to the allure. The formal lounge has high ceilings & is warmed by a cosy fire place, a perfect spot for adults to unwind. The well equipped timber kitchen opens on to a large meals/family area which in turn leads to the entertainment area of the home. The first bedroom makes for a great home business with external access. The main bedroom offers a generous size WIR and ensuite. The two other queen size bedrooms boast BIR’s. Wet areas are clean & well kept. Split system & two fire places assist comfort.
The shed will delight any man, offering a good sized ‘chill out’ zone. Delightful, established gardens surround the house. This quiet and desirable pocket between Bayshore Avenue and the bay is close proximity to The Dell, the boat ramp, parklands and the golf club. Also, just a short stroll to school and the local shops.
You wouldn’t want to miss it! View ASAP!
Insights: 8 Clifton Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Family lifestyle home in the High Ridge Estate
Situated in the much sought after High Ridge Estate, an opportunity has now presented itself with this beautiful property becoming available to the market. Featuring 5 bedrooms, this home has endless possibilities boasting 27 squares of living. The large kitchen features all stainless steel appliances throughout and flows through to the meals/living area that have views of the spacious backyard. With a sunken lounge room and large family room adjacent,this home would appeal to those families looking for that extra space. The property has a 12m x 10m workshop/garage and plenty of room to have a boat, caravan and other toys that this lifestyle property has to offer. Located within a few minutes drive of the famous local wineries and restaurants and close to all the other beautiful attractions that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.

Description:
Just Right!
Positioned to take in the view over the park from the open plan living space, and a northerly aspect in the formal lounge, this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom near new home is perfect for the sub 350k buyer! The well appointed kitchen with island bench flows seamlessly into the open plan living space with access to the private rear yard. The Master bedroom and full en-suite are located at the front of the home whilst the further 2 bedrooms and central bathroom toward the rear. The formal lounge and separate open plan living create 2 distinct zones for comfortable living. The home is located directly across the road from open parkland and a playground, allowing kids to enjoy playing at the park whilst you are able to keep an eye on them from the kitchen table!

Address: 69 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
SUPERB BAY VIEWS, A SHORT WALK TO SWIM, STYLISH NEW HOME, (SOLAR), WONDERFUL!
Near new stunning double storey house. Custom designed and quality built to take advantage of the light and great views. Elegant entrance with wide stairwell to second level. Downstairs has two bedrooms with large built in robes, modern bathroom with frameless shower and fancy Led shower head, beautiful free standing bath, good sized laundry and rumpus room with large sliding doors opening to another room which can be used as teenager's retreat, sunroom, sewing room or enclosed outdoor living as it has big sliding doors opening to both the backyard and a delightful courtyard. Upstairs has open plan living with enormous picture windows to enjoy the magical views across the bay. A well-equipped gourmet kitchen with Siemens dishwasher, easy to clean stainless steel gas cooktop, as new Westinghouse double door fridge (included), Bosch pyrolytic oven and trendy Quartzite bench top. Breezy balcony for the summer nights, study or 4th bedroom, stylish powder room and spacious master bedroom with ensuite that has elegant frameless shower, wall hung vanity with double sinks and roomy WIR. A big double garage with storage shelves and large single garage, both have 249 cm clearance for work vehicle, boat or caravan, plenty of room for parking on the driveway. Features include rainwater tank to toilets, high ceiling, polished hardwood floors, walk in pantry, split system, central heating, solar panels, generous electrical points, loads of storage and much more. Inspect to appreciate, by private appointment only.
Insights: 69 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

ADD YOUR TOUCH TO ADD VALUE IN THE FUTURE.
A chance to buy at an affordable price! Invest, downsize, maybe first time buy. Lounge with plenty of space for dining as well as second flexible living area with door opening to undercover entertaining. Side drive to double carport, back shed and good size open backyard, plenty of room to add the garden. Description:
4 Bedrooms Near The Beach
This beautifully presented 4 bedroom brick home has all the things today's buyers are looking for. Spacious family room. Open-plan lounge and dining area. Well appointed kitchen with gas and electric cooking and dishwasher. Main bedroom with en-suite and walk-in robe. Plenty of storage throughout. Gas Heating, ducted cooling, and ceiling fans in all bedrooms. Outside is a covered 6m x 5m pergola area ideal for summer entertaining. Double garage with remote door and room for boat, caravan or trailer. A quiet walk to local shops and waterfront.

Description:
A Private Oasis, Built for Entertaining
Set behind a commanding wall of hedges, this substantial property delivers a private and prestigious family lifestyle. Step up to the expansive wrap-around decks for views out to Corio Bay and the You Yangs, while looking down to the octagonal shaped in-ground pool and palm treed garden. Step inside this light-filled home to enjoy the dual living zones on the ground floor and more upstairs. A formal lounge and dining room offer full length windows bringing the outside in, and a welcoming home office. The kitchen and second living domain feature slate flooring and flow through from the formal living, also to the entertaining deck. Offering a Master bedroom with ensuite, two additional bedrooms BIR with central bathroom and a well sized laundry. Upstairs provides another complete package featuring a spacious living room or games room, two bedrooms, and central bathroom. The well proportioned interior spaces/ layout create an inviting ambiance, such as the covered terrace with sunken spa, the mature and established gardens plus garaging and extra space for the boat. This unique property must be viewed to be fully appreciated.
Insights: 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish, spacious and low-maintenance
This smart 3 bed, 2 bath townhouse maximises living space and minimises upkeep, making this the perfect home for couples or investors. Plus with the best of the coast close by, it’s time to reclaim your lifestyle!
Interiors feature soft coastal hues, with the modern wet areas and kitchen boasting neutral tiling and contemporary fittings. The hard-working floor plan separates sleeping areas from the living space, providing privacy and peace for all.
Soak up the sunshine in the nth-facing, open-plan kitchen, living and dining. This spacious entertaining hub has a built-in bar that’s always ready for guests. The full sized kitchen leaves nothing to desire, with plenty of storage and lots of prep space. Stainless steel appliances include a D'Amani dishwasher, electric oven and gas hob. Catch up on emails at the island bench with your morning coffee.
The light-filled master bedroom opens through the sliding door to a sweet paved area, perfect for twin sun lounges. The large walk-in robe is complemented by an en suite.
The 2nd and 3rd bedrooms, both with built-in robes, offer queen sized comfort. The tasteful bathroom has the convenience of a separate toilet.
Mod cons include ceiling fans and TV points to all bedrooms, with split system air conditioning to the main living hub.
The courtyard style garden is an easy-care solution for busy professionals and investors. The single lock-up garage offers security and privacy with an automatic roller door and internal house access.
View ASAP.
Insights: 2/9 Gaddang Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 2 other 3 bedroom unit in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A Breathtaking Transformation
Looking for a home in the sunny bayside town of Clifton Springs then this brick home is not to be missed. Having undergone a total renovation of the highest calibre this home offers a stunning lifestyle opportunity in one of the best locations on the Bellarine Peninsula.
Offering a stylish and contemporary feel from every room with light neutral tones and modern textures throughout.
Walk in through the entrance to the twin living zones and be greeted by a huge sun lite lounge room featuring floating floors, raked white ceilings, timber blinds and split system for all year comfort. Walk through to the dining area with split system and sliding door to rear yard and gourmet designer kitchen
The kitchen in this home is a cut above the rest and has stunning Caesar stone waterfall bench tops with 900 mm stainless steel oven and canopy, dishwasher, stylish twin function tap ware and a vast array of draws for easy access and an abundance of overhead cupboard in gloss white. This is truly a kitchen to be admired by all.
The home comprises of 3 generous bedrooms all with built in robes, curtains, s/s ceiling fans and are situated in close proximity to the new central bathroom that features a stunning oval bath, a floating vanity with heaps of storage draws, and new semi frameless glass door.
The rear yard offers an abundance of open grassed areas, with a purpose area for an alfresco, or a child's basketball area of anything that you may desire. With low maintenance garden beds around the perimeter the yard is a low maintenance blank canvas for the pool, caravan, or additional shed. All within walking distance to shops, transport, 5 minutes from Drysdale Village, and 5 minutes to the water options are endless here.
Insights: 47 Hill Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Bay Views & Walk To Waterfront
Life will be so much better when you can sit back and relax in this comfortable 3 bedroom home. Polished timber floors downstairs to the open plan lounge and dining area. Well appointed kitchen with gas and electric cooking, double pantry, dishwasher, and a servery window direct to the outdoor decking. Upstairs is the main bedroom and ensuite plus a fabulous parents retreat or family room. Dual door access to the decking and views of the bay, setting sun and city skyline. Outside is a decked patio area, single garage and direct access to the parkland behind.

Description:
Commercial Land With Bay Views!
Boutique Business Zoned Block. Situated in this boutique shopping strip of Clifton Springs is this fantastic business zoned block of land. This is the ideal location to operate a business at street level and live on the 2nd storey STCA. Bay views are great at ground level and would be fantastic from a 2nd storey building. At the rear of the property is a children's play park which offers a lovely outlook over the open space and means you won't be built out. Ample free parking is available for clients at the front of the property whilst the rear lane provides private and secure access. Clifton Springs is a growth area in the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula close to beaches, wineries, central Drysdale and only a short distance to Geelong.
Insights: 41 Centaurus Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Victoriana Style With Ample Living Space!
This four Bedroom home offers a warm welcome with masses of liveable space. Surrounded by established gardens and water glimpses, the home appeals to all demographics.
1 Waterford Place offers all the features for that desired lifestyle. Consisting of two large living spaces with high ceilings, it has a formal living and dining room with water glimpses, a second family room and meals area, and kitchen with island bench. Four generous bedrooms with built-in robes, a main with ensuite and walk-in robe. A study featuring a bay window creating a sense of spaciousness and allowing in natural light.Situated on approx. 600m2, the property also includes double garage with access to the backyard featuring terraced lawn, garden shed and decked alfresco with Vergola Louvre roof system, ensuring year round enjoyment.Other features include a central gas heating & evaporative cooling, side gate access, 900mm oven with gas cook top, gas hot water system, security system with video door phone.To cap it off this home is walking distance to public transport, close to golf course, shops and schools. Vendors are heading north and motivated to sell. Don't miss out!!!

Description:
So Many Options & Opportunities!
Buyers looking for a neat property that is handy to transport, golf course and boat ramp facilities will be excited to inspect this 3 bedroom home. Literally across the road from the golf course and even offering a small bay view this property will suit investors, those looking for a weekender, first home buyers or renovators- everyone really! Plenty of natural light enters the lounge room through expansive windows. The functional kitchen with meals area adjoins the lounge. Polished floorboards through-out the home. Central heating, reverse cycle air conditioner and wood heater give you a choice of climate control. A large carport/outdoor living area will accommodate the largest of social gatherings. There is also a single free standing garage/workshop in the rear of the yard. Situated on a generous 637m2 allotment. Currently tenanted but available with vacant possession if desired.

Address: 1 Cliff Edge Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Live the Lifestyle
Cliff Edge court is a highly sought location for all the right reasons, rural atmosphere for peace and tranquility and magnificent view across Corio Bay and beyond is hard to beat. Walk through the adjoining reserve to Clifton beach, a truly tranquil setting. Situated just 25minutes Geelong and 15 minutes to the Surf Coast beaches.
This well appointed 4 bedroom home, sits on just over 3 acres, the land is ideal for horses or other hobby farm pursuits.
The home is full of natural light, the central open design creates a social atmosphere ideal for entertaining. The master bedroom offers another level of privacy from the other bedrooms, with a second living room separately zoned for individual activities. Other features include an in ground pool, a large double lock up garage plus a purpose built boat shed with good height clearance. This property would suit a family looking to make a lifestyle change and enjoy all the benefits of country living on the Beautiful Bellarine Peninsula.
Insights: 1 Cliff Edge Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Room With A View Or Two!
Have you been waiting for a home in a quiet court with views of the bay and an indoor pool? Well look no further. Just listed is this amazing home that needs nothing doing except when it becomes yours you relocate yourselves and your furniture and enjoy life on the Bellarine. Be welcomed through the front door of this home and immediately your eyes are drawn straight to the views of Corio Bay, clear sight of the You Yangs and ships passing by. A lifestyle that you could get used to very quickly. Even the main bedroom with recently renovated ensuite has been angled so that when you wake up you see the view. Further living room again with views. Are you getting the message that this home has some views? Formal lounge with gas log fire for those cosy winter evenings. Completing this home are two more bedrooms, new bathroom, study and outdoor undercover living with a Stratco opening roof and all weather blinds. Central heating and split systems in most rooms have the internal climate covered.
One of the main features of this amazing home is the indoor oasis comprising pool, spa complete with bar. Bring on the party nights and days. Invite the family invite the friends but also allow yourselves the quiet enjoyment this lovely home brings.
Insights: 9 Tanderra Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
